layout.title: Submit Password
layout.description: Find the correct password and submit it

messages.lightModeMessage: Click the submit button below to continue

hints.lightModeHint: Remember, only try debugging code at night, not your sleep schedule during the day. Happy coding, nocturnal ninja!
hints.darkModeHint: Ever wondered what lies beneath those mysterious asterisks? Think like a developer and try to see what you write!

toastMessages.hintShown: Developer tools might help to match the case.
toastMessages.hintHidden: You are close but still something is missing.
toastMessages.wrongPassword: Check password. Your password is WRONG
